title: Movie Blockbuster Dataset
description: Cleaned movie dataset for visualisation workshop. Data originally scraped from IMDb by Daniel Grijalva.

columns.name: Movie title
columns.rating: Film content rating (e.g., R, PG, PG-13).
columns.genre: Main genre of the movie (e.g., Action, Drama, Comedy).
columns.released: Official release date in the format YYYY-MM-DD.
columns.score: IMDb user rating (on a scale of 0 to 10).
columns.writer: Writer or screenplay author of the movie.
columns.star: Main actor or actress in the movie.
columns.country: Country of origin of the movie.
columns.budget: Budget of the movie in USD. Some entries may appear as 0 if data is unavailable.
columns.gross: Revenue or gross earnings of the movie in USD.
columns.company: Production company responsible for the film.
columns.runtime: Duration of the movie in minutes.
